enterState

protected void enterState(GameContainer gameContainer,
                          StateBasedGame stateBasedGame)
                   throws SlickException
Will be called every time we enter this state Every time we enter this state, we have to reinitialize the map because the player could have abort the last game and starts a new one with a different map.

Overrides:
enterState in class View
Parameters:
gameContainer - The game container
stateBasedGame - A representation of the game
Throws:
SlickException

initResources

public void initResources()
Here you have to initialize all resources (images, fonts, sounds, ...) which you want to use in this state. The method will be called by the ResourceView and pre load all the stuff.

Specified by:
initResources in class View
